tokens.name: usdpipcoin / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:

- **BUY/SELL PRESSURE:** Ratio (1.7) > 1.5 + stable momentum → aggressive BUY.  
- **LIMIT ORDER:** Strong buying pressure overrides volatility (16.2% price change) → 0% (market order).

- **STOP LOSS:** Medium volatility → -8%–-15% range; stable momentum → -10%.  
- **TIME FRAME:** Medium volatility (16.2% price change) → 30min–2h; stable momentum → 2h as a balanced entry/exit window.
